description.narrative:
This project will address those gaps and connect those dots by working with UNDP, MONRE, Vietnam Food Association (VFA) and Vietnam Chamber of Commerce and Industry (VCCI) to tailor and promote Climate and Environment Business Index (CEBI)among rice businesses to mobilize their voluntary climate actions as well as to systematically anchor their participation in policy making process for developing concrete implementation mechanisms under NDC.
Overall Objective:To contribute to NDC implementation in Vietnam by encouraging businesses to take voluntary actions to cut their greenhouse gas (GHG) emission and to protect environment. Outcome 1: Businesses in the rice sector in Vietnam increase and improve corporate policies and practices on GHG emissionreduction and environment protection. Outcome 2: CEBI is mainstreamed into NDC’s implementation with concrete support mechanisms for agriculture corporates to reduce carbon emissions.
